apps.name: AnimeGlare
apps.subtitle: An anime app
apps.versionDescription: As a present from the AnimeGlare development team, we are releasing a new build to improve stability and provide our users with more links, sub or dub.
apps.localizedDescription: An anime app that let's you keep track of all your watched anime and connect to multiple tracking websites and sync your watch history.

news.title: AnimeGlare Source is now Avaliable!
news.caption: Please support the creators of Animeglare!
